reg_info.act_under: Ministry of Health Act   Loi sur le ministère de la Santé

content.content: 1. (1) The Minister may provide a nursing innovation fund bursary for an eligible program to an applicant who, (a) applies in writing; (b) is a resident of Ontario; (c) is the holder of a certificate as a registered nurse or registered nursing assistant under Part IV of the Health Disciplines Act; and (d) is employed or intends to be employed in nursing. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 1 (1). (2) An eligible program is an educational or training program that is relevant to nursing and that commences on or after the 1st day of July, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 1 (2). (3) An applicant is not eligible to receive more than one nursing innovation fund bursary a year. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Minister may provide a nursing innovation fund bursary for an eligible program to an applicant who,

(a) applies in writing;

(b) is a resident of Ontario;

(c) is the holder of a certificate as a registered nurse or registered nursing assistant under Part IV of the Health Disciplines Act; and

(d) is employed or intends to be employed in nursing. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 1 (1).

(2) An eligible program is an educational or training program that is relevant to nursing and that commences on or after the 1st day of July, 1990. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 1 (2).

(3) An applicant is not eligible to receive more than one nursing innovation fund bursary a year. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 1 (3).

content.content: 2. (1) The amount of a nursing innovation fund bursary shall be equal to the costs of attending the program not exceeding $1,500. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 2 (1). (2) The costs of attending a program include registration fees, the costs of program materials and expenses for travel and accommodation. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) The amount of a nursing innovation fund bursary shall be equal to the costs of attending the program not exceeding $1,500. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 2 (1).

(2) The costs of attending a program include registration fees, the costs of program materials and expenses for travel and accommodation. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 790, s. 2 (2).
